data.title: Livery Companies supporting the UK fashion and textile industry
data.meta_description: Livery companies have a very long history of supporting the fashion and textile sector and a number of them still provide funding for training, including bursaries for students
data.text:
Livery companies have a very long history of supporting the fashion and textile sector and a number of them still provide funding for training, including bursaries for students. For more details, please visit the individual websites of each Livery company.

The Textile Livery Group brings together 12 Livery Companies of the City of London which share a common aim to support skills and sustainable growth within the UK textile industry.

The Group have offered generous support to a number of UKFT projects. The Textile Livery Group is made up of:
